```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(DT)
```

```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
# Data -------------------------------------------------------------------------
author = c("Sears, Clara G. et al.",
           "Yeh, Tian-Shin et al.") # add authors

year = c(2022,
         2022) # add year of publication

title = c("Urinary Cadmium and Incident Heart Failure",
          "Longâ€‘term intake of total energy and fat in relation to subjective
cognitive decline") # add title of publication

journal = c("Epidemiology",
            "European Journal of Epidemiology") # add journal

discussed = as.Date(c("2022-03-16",
                      "2022-04-20")) # add date article was discussed

# Create data frame
dat = data.frame(author, year, title, journal, discussed)

# Create table -----------------------------------------------------------------
DT::datatable(
  dat,
  colnames=c("Author", 
             "Year",
             "Title",
             "Journal",
             "Discussed on:"),
  rownames = FALSE,
  fillContainer = FALSE,
  options = list(pageLength = 10)
)
```
